text: Manuel Diaz Montava (born May 14, 1957 in Alicante) is a cyclist from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He competed at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished first in the tandem road race. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from Alicante
